values: 使非常兴奋，使非常激动；兴奋，激动；引起激动的事情
A thrill is an exciting feeling.
The surfer enjoys the thrill of surfing a big wave.
v. to cause to feel very excited or happy 使激动
n. a quivering or trembling caused by sudden excitement or emotion
